HomePage.title: Welcome to EcoExplora
HomePage.aboutDescription:
is a digital repository of plants classified into categories such as medicinal, ornamental, fruit-bearing, and aromatic. This site provides relevant and accessible information about their uses, benefits, habitats, and natural recipes.
